title: Mercury Transit in the 1st House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 1st house for Capricorn Ascendant, thinking, communication, and self-expression become sharper and more visible. You feel mentally active, articulate, and eager to present ideas with clarity and logic. This phase supports planning, learning, and strategic conversations, especially where reputation and personal image matter. However, overthinking or appearing overly critical can affect impressions. Best results come from measured speech and structured thought, allowing intelligence and practicality to shape confident self-presentation.
